ValidationRule.description: Reason Details and Account Reporting In are required if Reason for Not Subscribing is Reporting in Another Account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Reason_for_Not_Subscribing__c , 'Reporting in another account') && OR( ISBLANK( TEXT ( Reason_Details__c )) , ISBLANK( Account_Reporting_In__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Reason Details and Account Reporting In must be completed when Reason for Not Subscribing is Reporting in another account
